org.openimaj.video

Class MBFImageFileBackedVideo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.video.Video<T>
      • org.openimaj.video.FileBackedVideo<MBFImage>
        • org.openimaj.video.MBFImageFileBackedVideo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, Iterable<MBFImage>

    public class MBFImageFileBackedVideo
extends FileBackedVideo<MBFImage>
    A video backed by a image files on disk. Each image file is a single frame. Images are of the RGB MBFImage type.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

        public MBFImageFileBackedVideo(List<File> files)

        Parameters:
        files - the image files

      • MBFImageFileBackedVideo

        public MBFImageFileBackedVideo(String filenameFormat,
                       int start,
                       int stop)
        Construct videos from numbered files using the given format string and indices. The format string should contain a single %d substitution.
        Parameters:
        filenameFormat - format string
        start - starting index (inclusive)
        stop - stop index (exclusive)
